name: Water Gun
desc: Slowbro fires a stream of water, damaging and slowing enemies hit. This move can be channeled to increase its range and damage.

name: Slack Off
desc: Slowbro gains a heal over time, healing 1.5% max HP per tick (6 ticks) and begins channeling a nap. While Slowbro remains channelling its nap, this healing is doubled.

name: Scald
desc: Slowbro fires a stream of boiling water, damaging enemies hit; creating a cloud of stream at the location of the first enemy hit, which slows and applies burn to all enemies inside. This burn reduces Attack by 30%.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Increases the size of the steam cloud.

name: Surf
desc: Slowbro rides on a wave, damaging, knocking enemies back, and throwing them in the air briefly. Two more waves follow after the first, damaging and slowing enemies.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: The second and third waves will now also throw enemies in the air, and the second wave will knock them back.

name: Amnesia
desc: Slowbro briefly becomes unstoppable, gaining +300 Defense for 4s, healing 22.5% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) 3 times, and gains 10% bonus damage on the next Surf or Scald used.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Also increases Slowbro's Sp. Defense by 150.

name: Telekinesis
desc: Slowbro shoots a beam, causing the first enemy hit to float in the air for 2s, restoring 15% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP). Slowbro can reactivate the ability to pull the enemy to them, but otherwise cannot act for the duration.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases the range and speed of the beam.

name: Slowbeam
desc: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP) and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.
